 I am just amazed that there are people out there that still love the Marx brothers! I mean doesn't every guy love the Stooges, but Groucho was a gotdamn genius. Doesn't one of our members have the quote (paraphrased): "I have my principles. And if you don't like them, I have others." Now, I ask you, who is that clever nowadays?

 Duck Soup is funny as hell. I agree with you that they are the funniest overall ever, especially Groucho. It's a damn shame that so many people nowadays say "Groucho Marx--he wrote the Communist Manifesto, right?" And everytime Groucho dances I fall off my chair.

 That reminds me of a plane trip I took a number of years back. It was a late flight out of Buffalo during a snowstorm and the pilot came on the intercom to kill some time. He announced that our attendants for the flight were the Lee Sisters, Ug Home and Ghast. We all got a kick out of that one.
